price: U hodu budi odmjeren, a u govoru ne budi grlat – zbilja, najneprijatniji glas je revanje magarca!”
arabic: وَٱقۡصِدۡ فِي مَشۡيِكَ وَٱغۡضُضۡ مِن صَوۡتِكَۚ إِنَّ أَنكَرَ ٱلۡأَصۡوَٰتِ لَصَوۡتُ ٱلۡحَمِيرِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-iq'ṣid fī mashyika wa-ugh'ḍuḍ min ṣawtika inna ankara al-aṣwāti laṣawtu al-ḥamīri
